ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3 pound) whole chicken, cut in half, backbone removed

cookingTips: Pat chicken dry before broiling for better browning and crisper skin
Position broiler rack 6-8 inches from heat source to cook through without burning
Let chicken rest 5 minutes after broiling before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you ensure broiled chicken is evenly cooked with crispy skin?
